chunks.cleaned_english_translation:
<speak>
    <s>But the Spirit of God was already hovering over our dark and fluid hearts, just like over the waters.</s>
    <s>In this Spirit, we would find rest, be brought to life by its breath, and be cleansed by its waters.</s>
  
</speak>
chunks.original_latin:
Recapitulatio. Spiritus autem Dei super cor nostrum tenebrosum
et fluidum, quasi super aquas jam superferebatur. In
quo subsistentes requiesceremus, cujusque vivificaremur
flatu, et cujus unda ablueremur.
